summary: Diff implements a new laptop-style browser page with URL bar, Go/Enter navigation, back/forward history, and reload via iframe key; updates app shell branding (HTML title + manifest) and introduces a coherent “graphite” theme via CSS/Tailwind. No clear evidence in the diff that VR/auth/mod-menu flows are still part of the primary UI, since App now renders BrowserPage directly.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/promo link (Caffeine referral) and decorative text not requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for any external attribution/footer marketing; BrowserPage includes a footer with a Caffeine AI referral URL and additional text.

hallucinated_features.description: Use of a heart symbol in user-facing footer text.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires user-facing text be in English; while this is not non-English, it is additional unrequested user-facing content/decoration.
